info.title: MEM (Mobile Email Management) V1
info.description:
# h1 Heading 8-)
first heading body text first sentence. Next sentence.
## h2 Heading
### h3 Heading
#### h4 Heading
##### h5 Heading
###### h6 Heading


## Horizontal Rules

___

---

***


## Typographic replacements

Enable typographer option to see result.

(c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +-

test.. test... test..... test?..... test!....

get.summary: Get the list of Account policies.
get.description:
Adminstrator can setup account compliance polices for a location group.
Given a startindex and pagesize it gets account policies for a location group.
It supports caching of the policies as well.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Start index of page. (Indexed to zero)

204.description: No account policies found for locationgroupId

post.description:
It is to report device requests that are serviced by SEG device makes a requests for a particular command.
Adds the payloads to the defined queue.

parameters.name: activeSyncPayload
parameters.description: An array of active sync payloads

400.description: Bad Request {1000 : Active Sync Payloads should not be empty.}

get.summary: Gets email Security Tag Policy.
get.description: It is used to block or allow device based on email security tag.

get.summary: The get impersonation credential payloads.
Returns a list of encryption key data payloads.
get.description: Encryption keys are used by SEG to encrypt attachments.

get.summary: Returns a list of encryption key data payloads.
get.description: Encryption keys are used by SEG to encrypt attachments.

get.summary: Returns the general attachment policy for managed devices.
get.description: Encryption keys are used by SEG to encrypt attachments. managed general attachment policies apply to attachments in managed devices

get.summary: Returns the general attachment policy for unmanaged devices.
get.description: Unmanaged General attachment policies apply to attachment transformations in unmanaged devices.

get.summary: Returns a list of deleted encryption key data payloads.
get.description: Encryption keys are used by SEG to encrypt attachments. Deleted keys correspond to the devices that got deleted or unenrolled.

post.summary: Retrieves Status for the list of AwInbox and Boxer Devices.

get.summary:
Retrieves list of AwInbox and Boxer Users for the OG
Returns Paged Results
if syncDatetimeStamp filter is specified, returns only AwInbox and Boxer Users added/edited since then
Get the list of Account policies
get.description: Device policies determine if the device is managed or unmanaged

get.summary: The get mem config device policies.
get.description: Device policies hold device compliance information and also determine if the device is managed or unmanaged

get.summary: gets deleted device policies.
get.description: Deleted device policies correspond to the devices that got delted or un enrolled.

get.summary: Gets the list of Eas DeviceType policies.
get.description: Eas Device policies hold information if the device has to allowed/blocked/white-listed

get.summary: Gets general access policy for a configuration.
get.description: General access policy contains blocking policies, requirement policies and default state of policies.

parameters.name: memConfigId
parameters.description: This is MEM configuration identifier which is used identify a configuration.

400.description: No general access policy found for location group id

get.summary: Gets MEM configuration settings for V2 SEG.
get.description: Given the configuration identifier it gets the details of the configuration.

parameters.name: memConfigId
parameters.description: This is MEM configuration identifier which is used identify a configuration.

500.description: Failed to load JWT Auth info

get.summary: Gets the installation settings for SEG.
get.description: SEG needs configuration settings during installation. It gives all the required settings for installation of SEG.

parameters.name: memConfigGuid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the MEM configuration.

500.description: Failed to load JWT Auth info

get.summary: Get the list of Api controllers
Gets the details about an endpoint
Gets the controller endpoints
Retrieve the index form for endpoints to be used for searching
Get the Hyperlink Policy
get.description: Hyperlink Policy holds the rules on how to transform hyperlinks in an email

post.description: Hyperlink Policy holds the rules on how to transform hyperlinks in an email

get.summary: Get the list of MailClient policies
get.description: Mail Client policies hold information regarding what mail clients are allowed/blocked

get.summary: Searches for the MEM Devices
Ping the server
Returns the general attachment policy for unmanaged devices.
get.description: Determines what syncs are allowed/blocked like Mail, Tasks, notes etc

delete.summary: New - Delete unmanaged devices by mem config.
delete.description: Deletes unmanaged devices for a specific mem config

whitelisted.description: Flag to indicate if the user is whitelisted.

domain.description: Domain Name for UserName (Required for AWEC Mail Client)

allowSync.description: Flag to indicate if allow sync is allowed or not.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

resultSet.description:
Gets or sets ResultSet
Array of returned account policy search results

AdditionalInfo.description: Gets or sets Hypermedia content for the result

ActiveSyncPayloadModel.description: An ActiveSyncPayload to capture Exchange ActiveSync requests.

locationGroupId.description: This is the organization group identifier. Typically used during enrollement.

userName.description: Username of the email account user.

command.description: Gets or sets command to device made to ActiveSync

easDeviceIdentifier.description: This is the device identifier contained in EAS requests. e.g. for iOS device this will be "Apple" + serial number.

deviceType.description: The device type defined by the EAS request.  (not the platform)

deviceClientIp.description: The IP address of client's device.

timeOfRequest.description: Gets or sets the time of request.

destinationUrl.description: Gets or sets the Destination URL

deviceOs.description: Gets or sets the device OS

listeningUrl.description: Gets or sets the Listening URL

syncAllowed.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Sync Allowed

transactionId.description: Gets or sets the transaction id of the request.

policyViolations.description: Gets or sets Collection of policies violated by a blocked MEG request.

bytesUp.description: Gets or sets Request size sent to mail server in bytes

bytesDown.description: Gets or sets Response size received from mail server in bytes

testMode.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this request was received while MEG was running in test mode.

emailClient.description: Gets or sets the email client.

awDeviceId.description: Gets or sets This is the actual device id saved in the Device table or UnmanagedDevice table.

managed.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether IsManaged

gatewayHostName.description: Gets or setsThe host name of the SEG server that processed the EAS request.

memConfigId.description: Gets or sets the MEMConfigId the payload belongs to

memDeviceId.description: Gets or sets the MEMConfigId the payload belongs to

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

reason.description: Reason for the Device being blocked

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

FileName.description: Gets or sets FileName {Will be set in the content-disposition header}

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID

SecurityTagsActionModel.description: Defines actions to be taken for each security tag

tagDescription.description: Description of what this tag is intended for.

awInboxAction.description: Flag to indicate inbox action. [Encrypt / Block / Do Nothing].

awInboxMessageId.description: Flag to indicate Inbox message id [0 = Default Message, else Message Template ID.].

awInboxMessageType.description: Gets or sets message template type [0=text, 1=html].

otherMailClientsAction.description: Flag to indicate mail client action [0 = Follow Attachment/Hyperlink policies, 1 = Encrypt, 2 = Block].

otherMailClientsMessageId.description: Flag to indicate other mail clients message id [0 = Default Message, else Message Template ID].

otherMailClientsMessageBody.description: Body of other mail client's message.

enrollmentUserId.description: Gets or sets the enrollment user id.

enrollmentUserName.description: Gets or sets the Enrollment username

enrollmentEmailUserName.description:
Gets or sets the Enrollment EmailUser Name.
The user name of the Gmail account.
This should not include the "@domain" part.
This field is intended to be used when MobileEmail mail type is GoogleApps.

enrollmentEmailPassword.description: Gets or sets the Enrollment Email Password.

enrollmentEmailPasswordSalt.description:
Gets or sets the Enrollment Email Password Salt.
This is the salt used to encrypt the EnrollmentEmailPassword

emailAutoGeneratedPassword.description: Gets or sets the Email AutoGenerate password.

emailAutoGeneratedPasswordSalt.description:
Gets or sets the Email Auto Generated Password Salt.
This is the salt used to encrypt the EmailAutoGeneratedPassword

emailAutoGeneratedPasswordLastReset.description:
Gets or sets the Email auto generated password last reset.
Last time auto-generated email password was reset

emailAddress.description:
Gets or sets the Email address.
Enrollment Email Address

awDeviceId.description: Internal airwatch managed or unmanaged device id

isManaged.description: Value indicating whether the device managed by AW

deviceType.description: Type of device such as Apple, Android,...

isDataProtected.description: Indicates whether device adhere to data protection requirements

isEnrolled.description: Indicates whether the device currently enrolled in MDM

daysSinceLastActivity.description: Last recorded activity of the device in days

isOsCompliant.description: Indicates whether the device violate any defined operating system policies

isModelCompliant.description: Indicates whether the device violate any defined model policies

easDeviceIdentifier.description: Device identifier contained in EAS requests. e.g. for iOS device this will be "Appl" + serial number.

mobileEmailDiagnosticsEnabled.description: Indicates whether the device is in Diagnostic Mode.

isNotMDMCompliant.description: Indicates whether the device is Compliant or not.

devicePolicyLoadStartTime.description: Date time for device policy load start

devicePolicyLoadEndTime.description: Time for device policy load end

allowSync.description: Indicates whether the Mobile Email Gateway request allowed

easProfileInstall.description: Determines whether EasProfileInstall was triggered for the device or not.

deviceIdentifier.description:
Device identifier.  For managed devices this can be the serial number, AirWatch Device Identifier, or some other attribute.
For unmanaged devices this is the EAS Device Identifier.

fullDeviceIdentifier.description: Full device Identifier. i.e. in case of Symbian "IMEI" + deviceIdentifier

EasDeviceTypePolicyPayloadModel.description: The eas device type policy payload model.

whitelisted.description: Indicates whether this is EAS device type Whitelisted.

allowSync.description: Indicates whether the Mobile Email Gateway request allowed

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

defaultEasDeviceTypePolicy.description: Indicates the default behavior of EAS Device Type Policy

requireEnrollment.description: Indicates whether Device is required to be enrolled or not

requireDataProtection.description: Indicates whether Device must adhere to data protection requirements

useManagedAttachmentPolicy.description: Indicates specific document types are encrypted or blocked for managed devices.

useUnmanagedAttachmentPolicy.description: Indicates if unmanaged attachement policy is on or not.

unmanagedAttachmentEncryptionKey.description: Indicates whether to encrypt/decrypt attachment for unmanaged devcies.

blockCompromisedDevices.description: Indicates whether to Block device that are compromised (e.g. Jailbroken)

blockInactiveDevices.description: Indicates whether to Block requests coming from device that have been inactive for x number of days.

daysBeforeInactive.description: The number of days before a device is considered inactive.

blockDiscoveredEasDeviceTypes.description: Indicates whether to block requests coming from unknown eas device types.

defaultEmailClientPolicy.description: Indicates the default access behavior for all email clients not explicitly allowed or blocked.

defaultEmailAccountPolicy.description: Indicates the default access behavior for all email user accounts not explicitly allowed or blocked

gatewayStatus.description: Indicates whether gateway is in enable mode or bypass mode.

IsTestModeEnabled.description: Indicates whether test mode is enabled or not.

requireEasProfile.description: Indicates whether require Eas profile is enabled in the current LG.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

GatewaySettingsModel.description: Complex object containing all the required settings of SEG.

generalConfig.description: This model contains all general settings of the SEG.

activeSyncPayloadReportingConfig.description: This model contains gateway settings related to the ActiveSync payload.

segHttpServerConfig.description: This model contains gateway settings related to HTTP listner of the SEG.

emailServerConfig.description: This model contains gateway settings related to the email server.

certAuthConfig.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to the Certificate Authentication.

consoleApiConfig.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to the Console API.

policyUpdateConfig.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to the Policy update.

contentTransformationConfig.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to content transformation of email.

jwtAuthConfig.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to the JWT Authenication.

clusterConfig.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to the Clustering.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

contentTransformationConfig.defaultBlockMessage: Attachment removed by mobile email policy.

GeneralConfigModel.description: Gateway Setting Transport Model For General Configuration (Linux).

singlePolicyUpdateContextPath.description: Context path of the SEG url.

allowEmailUntilPolicyIsReady.description: Indicates whether gateway should allow email access until policy update is completed successfully atleast once.

enableTestMode.description: Indicates whether to block any request or not.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

ActiveSyncPayloadReportingModel.description: Gateway Setting Transport Model  For ActiveSync Payload Configuration (Linux).

reportingIntervalInSeconds.description: Interval of reporting the ActiveSync payload to SEG in seconds.

logFilterCommands.description:
List of commands which are logged in SEG during ActiveSync requests.
<value>
1 = FolderSync, 2 = GetItemEstimate, 4 = Settings, 
8 = Provision, 16 = SendMail, 32 = SmartForward, 
64 = Smart Reply, 128 = GetAttachment, 256 = FolderCreate, 
512 = FolderDelete, 1024 = FolderUpdate, 2048 = MoveItems, 4096 = MeetingResponse, 8192 = Search, 
16384 = ItemOperations, 32768 = ResolveRecipients, 
65536 = ValidateCert, 131072 = Sync, 262144 = Ping
</value>

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

SegHttpServerModel.description: Gateway Setting Transport Model For SEG HTTP Server Configuration (Linux).

segHttpServerPort.description: Port on which SEG's HTTP listner is listening.

segServerIsSsl.description: Indicates whether HTTP listner is runnning on SSL.

uploadSslLocally.description: Indicates whether SSL certificate is uploaded locally from console.

httpsKeyStore.description: SSL cert which is uploaded into console.

httpsKeyStorePasscode.description: Password of the SSL cert uploaded.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

EmailServerModel.description: Gateway Setting Transport Model For Email Server Configuration (Linux).

serverHostAndPort.description: Email server url (host and port with protocol).

serverConnectionPoolSize.description: Number of concurrent open sockets to email server.

ignoreSslErrorsWithExch.description: Indicates whether gateway module will ignore SSL certificate errors when proxying to the Exchange active server.

CertificateAuthModel.description: Gateway Setting Transport Model For Certificate Authorization Configuration (Linux).

clientCertTrustStore.description: Root certificate which issues client certificates used by SEG with KCD.

enableKCDAuthentication.description: Indicates use of the KCD authentication.

requireClientCert.description: Indicates if basic authenication is allowed or not.

domainControllerHostName.description: Domain controller name used to define Kerberos realm.

targetSPN.description: Target SPN used to generate TGT in KCD authenication.

serviceAccountUsername.description: Service account username to generate TGT in KCD authenication.

serviceAccountPassword.description: Service account password to generate TGT in KCD authenication.

domainName.description: Domain used to defined the Kerbos realm.

awTenantCode.description: AirWatch Tenant Code to access the API.

ignoreSslErrorsWithAW.description: Indicates whether to ignore the SSL certificate errors when communicating with API or MEG Queue.

serverConnectionPoolSize.description: Size of the connection pool of API server.

cmsCert.description: CMS certificate used to access the API.

cmsCertPasscode.description: Passcode to decrypt the CMS certificate.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

PolicyUpdateModel.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to the Policy update.

bulkUpdateCompletionThresholdInSeconds.description: Max time for bulk policy update. If bulk update process exceeds this time limit then the process is considered failed.

policyUpdateErrorRetryCount.description: No of times gateway should retry updating policy after it fails.

segConfigRetryIntervalInMinutes.description: Interval to update gateway policy once it fails in minutes.

policyRefreshIntervalInMinutes.description: Interval to refresh gateway policy in minutes.

deltaPolicyRefreshIntervalInMinutes.description: Delta Sync interval to refresh gateway policy in minutes.

enableDeltaSync.description: Indicates if delta sync is enabled or not.

uuid.description: Gets or sets current objects UUID

ContentTransformationModel.description: This model contains the gateway settings related to the Policy update.

allowAttachmentUntilPolicyIsDataReady.description: Indicates whether attachment should be allowed or stripped.

defaultBlockMessage.description: Default Message that will be added to the email body when an attachment is stripped.

ignoreSMIMEContentTransform.description: Indicates whether the SMIME context transformation will be ignored or not.

sharedSecretKey.description: Key to decrypt the attachment encryption.
